items.name: CreateUniformRandomStream
items.description: Creates a separate random number stream.

items.name: CreateUnitByName
items.signature: CreateUnitByName(unitName: string, location: Vector, findClearSpace: bool, npcOwner: CBaseEntity | nil, entityOwner: CBaseEntity | nil, team: DOTATeam_t): CDOTA_BaseNPC
items.description:
Creates a unit by its dota_npc_units.txt name.
The spawned unit will not be controllable by default. You can use unit.SetControllableByPlayer() to change this.
Warning: mass synchronous unit spawning may be slow. Prefer CreateUnitByNameAsync unless synchronous access is required.

parameters.name: entityOwner
parameters.description: This entity will be returned by GetOwner() and GetOwnerEntity(). GetPlayerOwner() and GetPlayerOwnerID() will be automatically inferred from this entity. Can be changed after spawn using SetOwner(entity). When spawning heroes, passing CDOTAPlayerController makes hero use owned wearables.

items.name: CreateUnitByNameAsync
items.signature: CreateUnitByNameAsync(unitName: string, location: Vector, findClearSpace: bool, npcOwner: CBaseEntity | nil, entityOwner: CBaseEntity | nil, team: DOTATeam_t, callback: (unit: CDOTA_BaseNPC) → nil): SpawnGroupHandle
items.description:
Creates a unit by its dota_npc_units.txt name.
The spawned unit will not be controllable by default. You can use unit.SetControllableByPlayer() to change this.

parameters.name: entityOwner
parameters.description: This entity will be returned by GetOwner() and GetOwnerEntity(). GetPlayerOwner() and GetPlayerOwnerID() will be automatically inferred from this entity. Can be changed after spawn using SetOwner(entity). When spawning heroes, passing CDOTAPlayerController makes hero use owned wearables.

items.name: CreateUnitFromTable
items.description: Creates a DOTA unit by its dota_npc_units.txt name from a table of entity key values and a position to spawn at.

items.name: CrossVectors
items.description: Cross product between two vectors.

items.name: DOTA_SpawnMapAtPosition
items.signature: DOTA_SpawnMapAtPosition(mapName: string, location: Vector, deferCompletion: bool, onReadyToSpawn: (spawnGroupHandle: SpawnGroupHandle) → nil, onSpawnComplete: (spawnGroupHandle: SpawnGroupHandle) → nil, context: table | nil): SpawnGroupHandle
items.description: Spawn a .vmap at the target location.

parameters.name: mapName
parameters.description: A map name without extension, relative to "maps" directory.

parameters.name: deferCompletion
parameters.description: If true, to finish map loading you need to call ManuallyTriggerSpawnGroupCompletion(spawnGroupHandle).

parameters.name: onReadyToSpawn
parameters.description: Called only when deferCompletion is true.
